mapper.insert: INSERT INTO green_point(member_id, payment_id, amount) VALUES (#{request.memberId}, #{request.paymentId}, #{request.amount})
mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, payment_id, amount, CAST(created_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS createdAt FROM GREEN_POINT WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY created_at DESC, id DESC OFFSET #{page} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
